meta.Summary:: Report on the investigation of the loss of the fishing vessel Meridian KY147 with the loss of four crew, 160nm due east of Aberdeen on 26 October 2006. Report 20/2007. Published 4 September 2007.

title: Investigation Report - Meridian

Summary:
Report on the investigation of the loss of the fishing vessel Meridian KY147 with the loss of four crew, 160nm due east of Aberdeen on 26 October 2006. Report 20/2007. Published 4 September 2007.

Report on the investigation of the loss of the fishing vessel Meridian KY147 with the loss of four crew, 160nm due east of Aberdeen on 26 October 2006. Report 20/2007. Published 4 September 2007.
